svg.title: Comparison of notable bridges SMIL
svg.desc: Comparison of elevations of some notable bridges to scale, centred on (one of) their largest spans with an Airbus A380 and RMS Titanic, by CMG Lee. Hover over or click a label or profile to highlight it, and click the (i) button for its Wikipedia article. Data is derived from their respective Wikipedia articles and http://engineeringcivil.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/Akashi-Kaikyo-bridge-2.JPG , http://www.bath.ac.uk/ace/uploads/StudentProjects/Bridgeconference2009/Papers/WEIGHT.pdf , http://www.mostovik.ru/minisites/bosfor/images/fasad.jpg , http://railwaywondersoftheworld.com/wpimages/wpc6683220_05_06.jpg , http://sydney-harbour-bridge.bos.nsw.edu.au/images_content/bridge-loads.png , http://dita2indesign.sourceforge.net/dita_gutenberg_samples/dita_encyclopaedia_britannica/html/entries/images/bridges_13.png and http://etc.usf.edu/clipart/26200/26244/rialto_26244_mth.gif . A380 and Titanic profiles are from http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:En_mary_titanic.svg .
